gc_enable: With this function you can enable or disable the garbage collector. Calling the function with <tt>true</tt> as the argument enables it and using <tt>false</tt> disables it (not recommended). It is enabled by default.
enable (<tt>true</tt>) or disable (<tt>false</tt>) the garbage collector.
The above code disables garbage collection if the given global variable is <tt>true</tt>.
